categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Blitz" was the nickname of an Advanced Recon Commando commander who was part of Rancor Battalion and oversaw clone trooper training during the Clone Wars. He wore experimental Phase II clone trooper armor.

Blitz was born on the aquatic planet of Kamino, and was one of the millions of soldiers cloned from the DNA of the Mandalorian bounty hunter Jango Fett, who was hired by Count Dooku. During the Clone Wars, he was stationed on Kamino and oversaw clone trooper training with ARC Commander Colt and several others, hoping to find future ARC troopers. He later participated in the defense of Kamino, where he led three Advanced Recon Force troopers to destroy the attacking Trident drills. Blitz and another ARC trooper were the only survivors of the few ARCs that participated in the battle, and he was seen doing what appeared to be clearing up damage in the battle's aftermath.

Blitz wore experimental Phase II clone trooper armor with yellow markings, a personalized white kama with black diamonds embroidered on its design, and a yellow dual pauldron, along with a yellow rangefinder on his helmet and a life support backpack. He also had a yellow stripe running downward on the left side of his helmet that followed through his breast plate.
